europeana:record.dc:title: Entomofauna 19 (1998)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Anento Jorge L., Anikin Vasily Victorovich, Baehr Martin, Barron John, Bauer Rudolf, Buhl Peter Neerup, Carl Michael, Diller Erich, Dunk Klaus von der, Embacher Gernot, Ferrer Julio, Garcia-Gonzales F., Gusenleitner Fritz, Haeselbarth Erasmus, Hinz Rolf, Horstmann Klaus, Hüdepohl Karl-Ernst, Kirschenhofer Erich, Kocourek Miroslav, Lackerbeck Konrad, Leclercq Jean, Lozada Pedro W., Maczar Laszlo, Mey Wolfram, Niehuis Oliver, Nylander Ulf, Ornosa Conception, Papp Jenö, Schintlmeister Alexander, Schönitzer Klaus, Schubert Holger, Schwarz Maximilian, Sebald Helmut, Selfa Jesus, Steinhausen Walter R., Tschorsnig Hans-Peter, Wahis Raymond, Yang Ding, Zettel Herbert, Zolotuhin Vadim V.
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Wolfram Mey: Contributions to the knowledge of the caddisfly fauna of the Philippines, III (Insecta: Trichoptera). 1- 31. Zolotuhin: Further synonymic notes in the Lasiocampidae with the description of a new Euthrix-species (Lepidoptera: Lasiocampidae). 53- 74. Alexander Schintlmeister: Notes on some asiatic Furcula LAMARCK, 1816 (Lepidoptera: Notodontidae). 77- 108. Klaus von der Dunk, Hans-Peter Tschorsnig: Zweiflügler aus Bayern XIII (Diptera, Tachinidae). 145- 169. Garcia-Gonzales, Conception Ornosa: Metrical relations in Anthidium florentinum (FABRICIUS, 1775): a tool for studying its territorial behaviour (Hymenoptera, Megachilidae). 185- 187. Vadim V. Beitrag: Die Perilitus falciger-Gruppe (Hymenoptera, Braconidae). 197- 208. Karl-Ernst Hüdepohl: Über südostasiatische Cerambyciden XV und Disteniiden (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae, Disteniidae). 209- 230. Ding Yang: New species of Dolichopodidae from South China (Diptera, Dolichopodidae). 233- 240. Jenö Papp: Contributions to the braconine fauna of Cyprus (Hymenoptera, Braconidae: Braconinae). 241- 251. John Barron: The Palaearctic Species of Oetophorus (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Ctenopelmatinae). 253- 263. Peter Neerup Buhl: Two new species of Platygastrinae from Europe (Hymenoptera, Platygastridae). 265- 268. Erich Kirschenhofer: Neue Chalaeniinae der palaearktischen und orientalischen Region. (Coleoptera, Carabidae) 317- 329. Raymond Wahis: Sur les Pompilides de 1'Archipel maltais - Supplément (Hymenoptera: Aculeata, Pompilidae). 333- 336. Klaus Horstmann: Die europäischen Arten von Megarhyssa ASHMEAD, 1900 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae). 337- 350. Julio Ferrer: Contribution a la connaissance des Tenebrionidae de Madagascar (Insecta, Coleoptera). 353- 404.
